page.title: 13LOCAL NEWS ITEMS
page.content: FAMINE FIGHTERS- Famine fighters collected 2 tonnes of food relief for Africa and Workington old folks have given Â£100. Local schools have been collecting sugar to send as 'Food Aid' to the Ethiopia appeal. Each school has sent at least 6 sacks of sugar. 'YOU'R MUCH BETTER IN THE NORTH'-The North of England has the lowest shopping prices in the U.K., according to a recent cost-of-living survey.It shows that retail prices here are currently 3.5% lower than the U.K. average. RUNNING- Local marathon events currently attract over 800 entrants of all ages. LESSONS FOR ALL RACES-Local councils recently backed moves to implement the Swann report on multi-racial education, so that local schools would receive lessons about other cultures.
